Hello Dominik,

The easiest thing to do might be to use ExtractorUniversal.=
 You can add
that to your list of extractors. You might need to enable the =
frontier "
extractIndependently" property for it to run on your content.

O=
therwise, you could write a custom extractor, or modify ExtractorHTML.

Noa=
h
